text.english: Teorema: \(\texttt{mul}\) is distributive over \(\texttt{add}\), i.e. \[ \forall n,m,o \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{mul}(\texttt{add}(n,m),o) = \texttt{add}(\texttt{mul}(n,o),\texttt{mul}(m,o)) \]
text.italiano: Teorema: \(\texttt{mul}\) Ã¨ distributiva su \(\texttt{add}\), i.e. \[ \forall n,m,o \in \mathcal{N}Term . \; \texttt{mul}(\texttt{add}(n,m),o) = \texttt{add}(\texttt{mul}(n,o),\texttt{mul}(m,o)) \]

theorem.coq: Theorem mul_distrib_add: forall n m o : nterm , mul (add n m) o = add (mul n o) (mul m o).
